Blog.post: rax! malapit ka na dating! im so happy! at last i have someone to talk with. nakakapagod din kung sa keyboard parati nailalabas ang lahat ng sama ng loob. =) ei! i'll tour you here in dubai basta don't 4get the pasalubong ha. =)

waaah! its 11pm and im still in the office WORKING! =( damn that "final design" submission! its really diffcult to be an OFW. its much more difficult to be a hero! hehe! crap kasi economy sa pinas e. if only our wages in the philippines can support our family we wouldn't be working our ass here and be so far away from home... i miss home =( huhu! i miss my family and my friends. =( i miss the rain! gusto ko ng baha! =) shawie! kat! pumunta na kayo dito! iwan nyo muna mga bf nyo at sumapi kayo sa akin! =)
ey! i did not get fat. the camera adds 4 lbs. ok? =) i miss ou guys! we'll be home (hopefully) by end of december. we would still have to send a request form. we'll c u soon! mwah!
urlLink Tina, Claire, Emar & me =P urlLink

after half a year of not being able to watch a filipino tv show at last we have TFC! last week lang po kaya mejo excited! =). so....ok! testing...scan (boring..) scan (boring...) scan... wha!!!! hua ze lei!??? where is the rest of F4? bakit puro pinoy mga kasama niya? SCQ reload? a ok.. look alike lang pala ni Vic Zhou. anyways... napatigil ako dahil akala ko nga F4. dunno why pero natapos ko yung show and until now after work i make sure that we're home by 930pm just to watch SCQ! haha! puro kababawan lang naman yung mga stories nila pero siguro mababaw din ako dati kaya gets ko sila =). ito ang mga ka-boringan ko sa buhay. sleep--> eat --> work --> SCQ --> sleep ulit. except on thursday na may singit na "wash & iron clothes" =) haay...

If you yelled for 8 years, 7 months and 6 days you would have produced enough sound energy to heat one cup of coffee . ---> (Hardly seems worth it.) If you farted consistently for 6 years and 9 months, enough gas is produced to create the energy of an atomic bomb. ---> (Now that's more like it!) The human heart creates enough pressure when it pumps out to the body to squirt blood 30 feet. ---> (O.M.G.!) A pig's orgasm lasts 30 minutes. ---> (In my next life, I want to be a pig.) A cockroach will live nine days without its head before it starves to death. ---> (Creepy.) (I'm still not over the pig.) Banging your head against a wall uses 150 calories an hour. ---> (Do not try this at home...... maybe at work.) The male praying mantis cannot copulate while its head is attached to its body. The female initiates sex by ripping the male's head off. ---> ("Honey, I'm home. What the....?!") The flea can jump 350 times its body length. It's like a human jumping the length of a football field. ---> (30 minutes... lucky pig... can you imagine??) The catfish has over 27,000 taste buds. ---> (What could be so tasty on the bottom of a pond?) Some lions mate over 50 times a day. ---> (I still want to be a pig in my next life...quality over quantity) Butterflies taste with their feet. ---> (Something I always wanted to know.) The strongest muscle in the body is the tongue. ---> (Hmmmmmm........) Right-handed people live, on average, nine years longer than left-handed people. ---> (If you're ambidextrous, do you split the difference?) Elephants are the only animals that cannot jump. ---> (OK, so that would be a good thing....) A cat's urine glows under a black light. ---> (I wonder who was paid to figure that out?) An ostrich's eye is bigger than its brain. ---> (I know some people like that.) Starfish have no brains. ---> (I know some people like that too.) Polar bears are left-handed. ---> (If they switch, they'll live a lot longer.) Humans and dolphins are the only species that have sex for pleasure. ---> (What about that pig??) Now that you've smiled at least once, it's your turn to spread the stupidity to someone you want to bring a smile to (maybe even a chuckle)...
urlLink me and my friends.. kash, shheryl (my sister), kat d brat, rhacksz, cherl, rina, abbie and shawie =) urlLink

testing..testing... i'll write something next time. =) im still in the office. nagpapakaalila! and its already 730pm! we have a submission this weekend so have to work double time ( e ano itong ginagawa ko???) haha! ok CYA! testing...testing...
